data.title: Chris Griffiths - Chief Sales Officer at D'Addario & Company, Inc.
data.meta_description: Chris Griffiths is the Chief Sales Officer at D'Addario & Company, Inc.
data.text:
Chris Griffiths is the Chief Sales Officer at D'Addario & Company, Inc. Chris has been with the company since February 2016 and in their current role, they are responsible for full operations, HR, and P&L. Prior to their current role, Chris was the Director of D'Addario Accessories and they were responsible for manufacturing, global sales and marketing, global supply chain, and new product development.

Before joining D'Addario & Company, Inc., Chris was a columnist for The Globe and Mail. Chris reported on small businesses from December 2011 to June 2014. Prior to that, they were with fine tune consulting.

From September 2009 to January 2011, Chris was the Vice President at US Music Corp where they oversaw Washburn, Parker, Randall, Eden, Oscar Schmidt, Jay Turser, QuikLok, and Profile. Before that, they were the Division Manager of Musical Instruments at American Music And Sound from May 2009 to May 2010.

From July 2007 to May 2009, Chris was the General Manager at Gibson Guitar. Before that, they were the Director at MIAC from January 2003 to December 2009. Chris was also the Director at Newfoundland Power from January 2003 to December 2009. From August 1999 to July 2007, Chris was the President & CEO at Garrison Guitars.

Some of their coworkers include Jonathan Turitz - CMO, Bob Horvath - Chief Revenue Officer, and Ray Irizarry - Director, HR. Chris Griffiths reports to John D'Addario III, CEO & President.
